attributes.action: Ban the use of overlong (Bendy) busses in city centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These busses were not designed for our road network and cause more congestion than the double deckeckers that they are replacing.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the use of overlong (Bendy) busses in city centres."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15116.asp

Prime Minister's Office
